imageapp.filterregister¶

Functions

register(name, types[, help]) An instance of the decorator that will register the filters.

Classes

Filter(function, name, types, help) Model of a filter register.
FilterRegister Class that creates a register decorator.
class imageapp.filterregister.Filter(function, name, types, help)¶

Model of a filter register.

Parameters:
  • function (function) – Function to be registered.
  • name (str) – Name of the filter that will be displayed in the menu.
  • types (list of str) – Types of image mode that the filter supports.
  • help (str) – Message that will be displayed in the command line help.
class imageapp.filterregister.FilterRegister¶

Class that creates a register decorator.

_filter_register()¶

This function creates an empty dictionary and a decorator, every decorated function will be added to the dictionary.

Returns:Decorator that register filters.
Return type:function
get_register()¶

Instance a new decorator to register filters.

Returns:Decorator that register filters.
Return type:function
imageapp.filterregister.register(name, types, help=None)¶

An instance of the decorator that will register the filters.
